text.author: Benjamin Gerber
text.summary: The team of Project London, a sci-fi film with tie-in products, talk about the experience of making the film, the tie-in graphic novel, the creative process, marketing the film at conventions, and the next steps for the team.
text.title: Indie Talks Episode 16 - Phil McCoy, Jen Page, Ian Hubert and Project London
